text: The Chamber of the Holocaust is a small museum in Mount Zion in Jerusalem. It is dedicated to the Holocaust. The museum opened in 1948. It was the first museum dedicated to the Holocaust. The museum opened before the establishment of Yad Vashem museum in Mount Herzl in 1953. == Other websites == * The museum on the IMuseum website Category:Mount Zion Category:Museums in Jerusalem
title: Chamber of the Holocaust
